recommended_degree: Bisnis Digital, Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Ilmu Hubungan Internasional, Ilmu Komunikasi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Job Description
- Assist in creating engaging content for social media platforms (photo, video, and graphics).
- Take and edit videos/photos to support digital marketing campaigns.
- Design flyers, posters, and other promotional materials for social media.
- Support the planning and scheduling of social media posts.
- Collaborate with the team to brainstorm creative ideas and execute campaigns.
- Monitor social media trends and provide input for content improvements.
